page.title: 13A BOY'S DAY
page.content: My name is{Llewelyn Morgan}and I live in{Grosmont.}I am{nine}years old.I woke up at six thirty in the morning and read my book. Then I got up and dressed.I wore a dark blue jumper,a green and red shirt and yellow socks.For{breakfast}I had bacon,fried bread,milk and crossiants.Then I did my piano practice.After I got ready I walked to school at nine o'clock I got out of school at about half past three and dawdled home.When I got home I asked for my{pocket money}and went to the post office and got my comic and went home.Irubbed my free Ewok transfers down onto my poster.After that I ate some crisps and had orange juice. I watched T.V. then went in the garden.Dad came home and I had some chocolate from him.Then we planted some beans, and I got very muddy!
